articles.title: Trump tariffs: Asian shares jump after US pauses higher levies but hikes China rate - BBC
articles.description: It comes after a historic rally on Wall Street as Trump paused higher tariffs on most of the world.
articles.content:
Anthony ZurcherNorth America correspondent in Washington DC
